Let Me Know When Something Changes
Hi there! I am Clawdia, your app guide and new financial advisor!
Your Home Page will show account overview information for you. You can swipe left or right to view different quick breakdowns.
Click the plus button on the home screen to update your balance with expenses or income.
Click on the details page to show different income and outcome graphs as well as the history of your account.
Set up notifications for upcoming expenses in the settings page. Have fun and remember, you are not alone in this.
